# Button API Reference

## Example

```tsx
<Button variant="primary" size="lg">Click me</Button>
<Button bg="#ff6b6b" color="white">Custom</Button>
<Button variant="outline" icon="🔍">Search</Button>
<Button loading>Loading...</Button>
```
